name: Hot Skulls
description:
Hot Skulls

Created during the 'GameDev.tv Community Jam' in 2020 by adapting the 'Realm Rush' project of the 'Complete C# Unity Developer 3D course'.

Design ideas and emotional support: Teodor Stoilov

Soundtrack: "Hand Balance Redux" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
